info.title: Changerawr API Documentation
info.description: The official documentation for the Changerawr API. rawr

403.description: Setup already completed - Cannot run setup more than once

500.description: An unexpected error occurred during setup
An unexpected error occurred while fetching projects

400.description: Invalid input - Project name is required

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the project

isComplete.description: Indicates whether the setup has been completed (true if at least one user exists)

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while checking setup status
